description: This header file defines the exported API functions for the Beep Req Controller Object in the BSP Execution Environment Plane (BEEP). It declares functions related to creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the Req Controller.

methods.name: BeepCreateReqController
methods.description: Creates a new Beep Request Controller object given container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: BeepReqcoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new Beep Req Controller object given container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: BeepReqcoRemove
methods.description: Removes the specified Beep Req Controller object.

methods.name: BeepReqcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects into the Beep Req Controller object.

methods.name: BeepReqcoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Beep Req Controller object.
